name: MOTIFE
tagline: Kick-start your software team in Poland
description:
At MOTIFE we help businesses scale up their development teams with tailored offshoring solutions.
If you're looking for a long term nearshoring or offshoring solution check out https://motifedigital.com
MOTIFE is a team of experienced consultants and advisers with 15+ years of international experience in software. We help software startups and well-established businesses scale up by leveraging technology talent pool in Kraków, Poland.
We recruit and build dedicated engineering teams. We make the teams available in the outsourced model or help you establish your own subsidiary in Poland.
